title: Scan Next.js project for TypeScript errors
description: Verify that the tool correctly scans the entire Next.js project to detect all TypeScript type errors.

steps.description: Initiate the project scan for type errors.
Check the tool returns a complete list of detected TypeScript errors.
Confirm no false positives or missing errors in the report.

title: Auto-fix safe TypeScript errors
description: Verify that the tool safely applies automatic fixes to all fixable TypeScript errors without manual intervention.

steps.description: Run the auto-fix command after detecting TypeScript errors.
Confirm the fixed TypeScript errors no longer appear after auto-fix.
Verify the project compiles successfully after fixes.

title: Detect and classify build and runtime errors
description: Verify that the tool correctly identifies build failures and runtime crashes during scanning and categorizes them appropriately.

steps.description: Initiate project scan which includes build and runtime error detection.
Check the tool's report includes accurate detection and classification of build or runtime errors.
Verify that errors unrelated to build/runtime are not misclassified.

title: Auto-fix build and runtime errors where safe
description: Verify the tool attempts automated fixes for build and runtime errors that are safe to fix and does not apply unsafe fixes automatically.

steps.description: Run the auto-fix on detected build and runtime errors.
Verify that safe fixable build/runtime errors are resolved automatically.
Confirm no unsafe or risky fixes are applied automatically.
Validate that after auto-fix, the build completes without crashing.

title: Detect UI bugs and layout inconsistencies
description: Verify that the tool detects UI bugs, layout inconsistencies, and animation issues within the Next.js project components.

steps.description: Scan the project UI components for bugs and layout issues.
Verify detected UI and animation bugs are accurately reported with affected files and locations.
Ensure tool covers Sidebar Navigation and Global Layout related UI checks.

title: Auto-fix UI layout and animation issues
description: Verify the tool automatically applies safe fixes to UI bugs, layout inconsistencies, and animation problems without breaking the UI.

steps.description: Run the auto-fix on detected UI and layout issues.
Confirm resolved UI issues and be able to visually validate fixes via regression testing.
Verify no new UI issues are introduced after fixes.

title: Improve performance metrics automatically
description: Verify that the tool detects performance bottlenecks and applies fixes that improve overall application performance as measured by Lighthouse scores.

steps.description: Scan for performance issues in the Next.js application.
Apply the tool's auto-fix suggestions to improve performance.
Validate that the Lighthouse performance score improves and is above 90 post-fix.

title: Enhance SEO and accessibility metrics
description: Verify that SEO and accessibility issues are detected and fixed by the tool, improving Lighthouse scores above 90 in these areas.

steps.description: Scan the project for SEO and accessibility issues.
Apply automated fixes recommended by the tool.
Ensure Lighthouse SEO and accessibility scores exceed 90 after fixes.

title: Generate clear and comprehensive error reports
description: Verify that after scanning and auto-fixing, the tool produces detailed error reports that include explanations, categorized issues, and fix status.

steps.description: Complete a full scan and auto-fix cycle.
Check the error report includes all detected issues, fixed and outstanding, with clear explanations.
Verify the report format is consistent, readable, and actionable by developers.

title: Validate final build after auto-fixes
description: Verify that the final output of the Next.js project is build-ready, successfully compiling without errors or runtime crashes after applying all auto-fixes.

steps.description: Apply all automated fixes recommended by the tool.
Build the Next.js project.
Confirm the build completes successfully with no errors or warnings.
Run the built project and verify no runtime crashes occur.

title: Handle projects with no detectable issues gracefully
description: Verify that when the project has no detectable TypeScript, build, runtime, UI, performance, SEO, or accessibility issues, the tool completes scan and reports accordingly.

steps.description: Scan a clean Next.js project with no known issues.
Verify the tool returns an empty or zero-issue report gracefully.
Confirm the tool does not apply any unnecessary fixes.

title: Report and skip unsafe auto-fixes
description: Verify that the tool detects unsafe errors that should not be auto-fixed and clearly reports them for manual developer intervention.

steps.description: Scan a project containing errors flagged as unsafe to auto-fix.
Confirm the tool lists these errors in the report with warnings about not applying auto-fix.
Verify the tool skips applying auto-fixes for these unsafe errors.

title: Seamless integration with Sidebar Navigation
description: Verify that fixes related to Sidebar Navigation component (collapsible sidebar, animations, active states) are correctly detected and auto-fixed without breaking functionality.

steps.description: Scan the Sidebar Navigation codebase for issues.
Apply auto-fixes related to Sidebar Navigation bugs.
Verify that Sidebar Navigation remains fully functional with correct animations and active state handling post-fix.

title: Seamless integration with Global Layout
description: Verify that fixes related to the Global Layout component including Sidebar and Navbar placement are detected and applied safely without layout breakage.

steps.description: Scan Global Layout files for layout and UI issues.
Run auto-fix to resolve any detected problems.
Validate that the overall page structure remains visually consistent and functional after fixes.

title: Handle partial fixes with outstanding issues
description: Verify that when some issues cannot be auto-fixed, the tool provides a clear summary indicating which issues remain unresolved for manual action.

steps.description: Scan a project with a mix of safe and unsafe errors.
Apply auto-fixes on safe errors only.
Verify the tool reports which errors were fixed and which require manual intervention.
